issue.title: [TESTS] Add a testing coverage tool
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15309](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15309). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would be good to estimate what fraction of the code the tests cover. Using a tool such as [CodeCov](https://about.codecov.io) or [Coveralls](https://coveralls.io/) maybe helpful
